enhacements.description: Add verbose flag to all commands and subcommands, which activates logger on Debug level.

breakings.description: Do not use liferay/portal-snapshot for Nightlies: we are going to use mdelapenya/portal-snapshot, a clone of Liferay's build process that executes daily on Travis-CI)

enhacements.description: Add prune command to remove containers and images.
Add Sirupsen's logrus as default logger.
Use Go modules and Go v1.12.x

fixes.description: Use canonical image when pulling Docker iamges.
Fix tags command when no data is present.

breakings.description: Use new tags for mdelapenya's Docker images.

enhacements.description: All images now use same internal environment variable for JVM_OPTS.
Move database constants to the configuration file.

fixes.description: Update static assets related to previous version.

enhacements.description: Support storing variable values (container names and images to use) in a configuration file instead of in constants.

breakings.description: Deploy HTML website on Github pages, instead of on WeDeploy

enhacements.description: Support adding a MySQL or PostgreSQL datastore. Expanding the run command it's possible to run a database alongside the instance. The commands start, stop and rm are affected, performing its operations over the database instance.
Improve output of pull command when displaying pull progress.
Add start command.
Display tags in a table.

breakings.description: Removed the ability to configure portal using an external portal-ext properties.

fixes.description: [lpn tags] Show a more accurate message when the tags count is lower than the defined page size

enhacements.description: Pull commands are more legible than before

breakings.description: 'commerce' command uses Official Liferay Commerce images instead of mdelapenya's commerce images
'nightly' command uses Official portal snapshots instead of mdelapenya's nightly builds

fixes.description: Fix 'tags' command after Docker Hub UI revamp. Now it's possible to paginate in the tag results

enhacements.description: Add an 'open' command, which allows opening a browser poiting to the home page of the running instance.
Improve README's readability, explaining features, not commands.

fixes.description: Fix permissions on the file deployed to the running container.
Fix default memory value for different subcommands. Official images work in a different manner than the unofficial ones.

enhacements.description: Support for the Liferay Official images! Every main command has a 'ce' and 'dxp' subcommand.
Add 'rmi' command, which allows removing Docker images from the system.
Add a Docker label to the containers run by this tool.
Improve logs for CheckContainer command
Migrate all commands to the embedded Docker Client

fixes.description: Fix default tag value when pulling release without '-t' flag

enhacements.description: Add --properties (-P) flag when running an image to specify the full path of a portal.properties to configure the running instance.
Add tags command, which list available tags for the specific image (release, nightly or commerce)
Add --memory flag when running an image to specy the Xmx and Xms memory tuning parameters

fixes.description: Fix bug when running releases with default tag (latest)
Fix build process for WeDeploy releases

enhacements.description: Refactor code to make commands more easily extendible
Support running a container per image type at the same type (commerce, nightly build and release)
Support for Commerce images
Add --force flag when pulling an image to ensure it removes a potential existing one
Document install process for NON-brew users
Check if docker is installed before executing any command
Include docker version output in version command

breakings.description: The container is not named 'liferay-portal-nook' anymore. Instead it's used 'lpn-TYPE'

fixes.description: Fix minor typo in logs when running the container and it already existed.

enhacements.description: Migrate shell scripts for functional tests to Cucumber + Aruba
Support for Liferay Portal 7.1 Milestone 1
Publish releases to WeDeploy!

fixes.description: Fix error when executing 'license' and 'version' commands, as the static resources where not loaded into the binary properly.

enhacements.description: Add deploy -f command, which deploys files to Liferay Portal's deploy directory.
Add deploy -d command, which deploys the contents of directory to Liferay Portal's deploy directory.
Add dep as dependency manager.
Add stop command.
Add codecov support.
Add functional tests for the CLI .
Use BSD-3 license.
Support running releases of Liferay Portal.
Add a flag for 'run' command to set up the 'debugPort' to use when debugging.
Support for debug mode
Add a flag for 'checkImage' command to set up the 'tag' to be checked.
Include Windows support.
Add a flag for 'run' command to set up the 'httpPort' to be used
Minor improvement: reorganise code to be more reusable.
Modularise using `Cobra` as command manager.
Add update, log, rm, pull, run, version, checkImage and checkContainer commands.
Run a Docker container from Liferay Portal nightly builds.
